statements: SELECT * FROM court_orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT child_name, custody_status FROM court_orders WHERE custody_status = 'Joint Custody';
SELECT * FROM court_orders WHERE date_issued > '2022-01-01';
SELECT custody_status, child_name FROM court_orders WHERE custody_status = 'Sole Custody' ORDER BY child_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM court_orders WHERE custody_status = 'Joint Custody';
SELECT * FROM court_orders ORDER BY date_issued DESC, custody_status ASC
SELECT order_id, child_name FROM court_orders WHERE custody_status = 'Active'
SELECT child_name, custody_status FROM court_orders WHERE order_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT * FROM court_orders WHERE date_issued >= '2022-01-01' AND custody_status = 'Inactive'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM court_orders
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_description FROM court_orders;
SELECT * FROM court_orders WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT order_description, order_date FROM court_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_type FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type = 'Contract';
SELECT * FROM court_orders JOIN legal_documents ON court_orders.order_id = legal_documents.document_id;
SELECT * FROM court_orders WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT order_id, order_description FROM court_orders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM court_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(order_id) AS max_order_id FROM court_orders;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type LIKE '%contract%' ORDER BY document_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CourtOrders;
SELECT child_name, judge_name FROM CourtOrders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT order_id, judge_name FROM CourtOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Court Order';
SELECT document_id, document_type FROM LegalDocuments WHERE custodian_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM CourtOrders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT child_name, judge_name FROM CourtOrders ORDER BY judge_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments WHERE custodian_id IN (SELECT custodian_id FROM CustodyArrangements WHERE parent1_name = 'John');
SELECT document_type, COUNT(*) FROM LegalDocuments GROUP BY document_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT parent1_name AS father, parent2_name AS mother FROM CustodyArrangements WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CourtOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_description FROM CourtOrders WHERE custodian_id = 2;
SELECT custodian_name, custodian_address FROM Custodians WHERE custodian_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT child_name, child_birthdate FROM Children WHERE child_gender = 'male' ORDER BY child_birthdate ASC;
SELECT doc_id, doc_type, doc_date, doc_content FROM LegalDocuments;
SELECT * FROM CourtOrders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT order_description, order_id FROM CourtOrders WHERE custodian_id = 3 AND child_id = 5;
SELECT custodian_name, custodian_phone FROM Custodians WHERE custodian_id = 2;
SELECT doc_type, doc_date FROM LegalDocuments WHERE doc_id = 3;
SELECT child_name, child_birthdate FROM Children WHERE child_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM CourtOrders;
SELECT order_id, order_type FROM CustodyArrangements WHERE child_id = 123;
SELECT doc_id, doc_type, doc_content FROM LegalDocuments WHERE doc_type = 'Legal';
SELECT child_name, date_of_birth FROM ChildDetails ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT guardian_id, guardian_name, contact_number FROM Guardians WHERE guardian_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM CourtOrders;
SELECT order_id, order_type, order_date FROM CourtOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT doc_id, doc_type FROM LegalDocuments WHERE doc_type='Agreement';
SELECT child_name, date_of_birth FROM ChildDetails WHERE date_of_birth < '2010-01-01';
SELECT c.child_name, g.guardian_name FROM ChildDetails c JOIN Guardians g ON c.child_id = g.guardian_id;
